concept.title: Multiply
concept.shortdesc: obtain from (a number) another that contains the first number a specified number of times.

conbody.p: To multiply a number we take an established number and repeat it as many times as determined by the second number.
If we begin with the number [8] and repeat it (multiply) [5] times (8+8+8+8+8), we are left with [40].
In the JPS Calculator App the multiply fucntion is represented by the [x] key.
